basics.name: Pranali Patil
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: A focused and adaptable Electronics and Instrumentation Graduate looking forward to pursue Masters to explore opportunities in the ever changing world of technology.

work.company: Bhabha Atomic Research Center, Trombay, Mumbai
highlights: Development of EMAT based ultrasonic Sensor for Non Destructive Evaluation NDE applications in nuclear reactor Components

Experimental work for evolving a methodology for measuring gap between in-accessible outer tubes using MATLAB based Pulsed Eddy Current Testing sensor techniques suitable for nuclear reactor applications.

work.company: Indian Oil Corporation Limited , Research and Development Centre, Faridabad
work.summary: Bio-Research Centre and Hydro-Processing Pilot Plant
highlights: Study of PLC based Control System of Hydro-Processing Pilot Plant.
Trouble-shooting Analytical instruments like HR-GCMS in Bio-research Centre

volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: procession of creating awareness of different social problems like education, cleanliness, and health hygiene in rural and city suburbs of Vellore district.
Organization provides help in natural and man-made disasters by providing food, clothing, and first aid to victims.
